abstract: The Dow Jones industrial average closed above 14,000 for the first time on Thursday, only to fall back on Friday.
snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average closed above 14,000 for the first time on Thursday, only to fall back on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average closed above 14,000 for the first time on Thursday, only to fall back on Friday. Friday’s losses pulled the major market averages into negative territory for the week.

headline.main: A Surge to 14,000, Then a Retreat
headline.print_headline: A Surge to 14,000, Then a Retreat
